inclusion.criterion: Women with known type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients in all groups shall receive initial diabetes education and started on an individualized diabetic diet regimen
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The patient does not have a cellular phone
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: The fetus has a chromosomal or non-chromosomal malformation
exclusion.label: triggers
